localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Plan the things you love to do with your friends both online and in person. Make plans with friends, share plans, see what others are up to, and keep track of upcoming events. Plan get-togethers, brunch, study sessions, your next date, you name it!
blogPost.body: Plan the things you love to do with your friends both online and in person. Make plans with friends, share plans, see what others are up to, and keep track of upcoming events. Plan get-togethers, brunch, study sessions, your next date, you name it!
blogPost.title: Planmesh - The easiest way to plan with friends
blogPost.author: Jose Togbe

localize.description: 计划您喜欢的事情，与您的朋友在线和亲自做。与朋友一起制定计划，分享计划，看看其他人在做什么，并跟踪即将到来的活动。计划聚餐、早午餐、学习课程、下一次约会，你说的都可以。
localize.tagline: 最简单的和朋友一起计划的方法

localize.description: 計劃您喜歡的事情，與您的朋友在線和親自做。與朋友一起制定計劃，分享計劃，看看其他人在做什麼，並跟蹤即將到來的活動。計劃聚餐、早午餐、學習課程、下一次約會，你說的都可以。
localize.tagline: 最簡單的和朋友一起計劃的方法

localize.full_text: 比特币今天超越苹果300%的表现。
比特幣今天超越蘋果300%的表現。

next.excerpt: Life is a magical journey; why not getting some souvenirs out of it? 1. Open the app. 2. Write down 3 things you are thankful for that day. 3. That's it! We are working on exciting features. Have fun with the innovative Souvenir gratitude tracker app!
next.title: Souvenir - A gratitude journal to track the good in your life

localize.description: 人生是一场神奇的旅行，为什么不从中获得一些纪念品呢？1. 打开应用程序。2. 写下当天你所感谢的3件事。3. 就这样吧! 我们正在努力开发令人兴奋的功能。祝你在创新的纪念品感恩追踪器应用中玩得开心!
localize.tagline: 追踪生活中美好事物的感恩日记。

localize.description: 人生是一場神奇的旅行，爲什麼不從中獲得一些紀念品呢？1. 打開應用程序。2. 寫下當天你所感謝的3件事。3. 就這樣吧! 我們正在努力開發令人興奮的功能。祝你在創新的紀念品感恩追蹤器應用中玩得開心!
localize.tagline: 追蹤生活中美好事物的感恩日記。
